main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed by Mr. Paul J. Saunier, Jr. and his family over Albany, New York, on 14 July 1951.
interesting points: The object maneuvered in the sky for approximately five minutes,It descended close to the ground and then ascended again,It appeared larger and brighter than an ordinary aircraft,The observation was made around 9:00 PM,Some conclusions suggested the object could be a balloon but insufficient data prevented a definitive evaluation.
witness description: Mr. Paul J. Saunier, Jr. and his family
